product_name: The North Face Crimptastic Hybrid Down Jacket - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: With strategically placed down insulation and stretch panels, the North Face Crimptastic Hybrid down jacket is designed to keep you warm while allowing maximum mobility. Ripstop nylon shell fabric with a Durable Water Repellent finish sheds wind, snow and wet weather. Premium 600-fill-power goose down in the body, shoulders and sleeve tops is extremely compressible and offers exceptional warmth. Polartec(R) Power Stretch(R) fleece at sides and under arms enhances breathability and ensures a comfortable, non-bulky fit. Drawcord hem. The North Face Crimptastic Hybrid down jacket has zip handwarmer pockets and internal security pocket. Closeout.
short_description: With strategically placed down insulation and stretch panels, the North Face Crimptastic Hybrid down jacket is designed to keep you warm while allowing maximum mobility.
